mapper.select: select b.no,name,title,contents,hit,reg_date as regDate,group_no,order_no,depth,user_no from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no order by regDate desc limit 0,5
select * from board where title = #{title} and reg_date as regDate= #{regDate}
select no, title, contents, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }
select * from board where title = #{title} and contents = #{contents}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no=#{no }
mapper.select: delete from board where no=#{no} and title=#{title}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title }, contents=#{contents } where no=#{no}
